ref: 10294 mr̥ddhá ʻ forsaken ʼ MaitrS. [márdhati ʻ neglects ʼ RV. ʻ wets ʼ Dhātup. (< ʻ *softens ʼ?) -- The words of L. P., if derived from this, support an orig. meaning ʻ crush ʼ for √mr̥dh: see EWA ii 595]
awāṇ. middhuṇ, pp. middhā ʻ to crush ʼ;
awāṇ. middhuṇ, pp. middhā ʻ to crush ʼ;
P. middhṇā, pp. middhā ʻ to stir up, mix, knead (mortar), rumple, tumble (clothes, paper, &c.), spoil by treading on (crops) ʼ; -- or < *mr̥ndati (s.v. márdati) X mánthati?
